      • modify

        public static LocalDateTime modify(Calendar startingDate,
                                   String... adjustmentsArray)
                            throws ParseException
        The adjustments are separated by a space. Multiple elements are acceptable and are assumed to be more adjusts. This just provides flexibility in how this method can be called.
        Parameters:
        startingDate - a Calendar object.
        adjustmentsArray - a String object.
        Returns:
        a Calendar object.
        Throws:
        ParseException

      • now

        public static LocalDateTime now(String... adjustmentsArray)
                         throws ParseException
        The adjustments are separated by a space. Multiple elements are acceptable and are assumed to be more adjusts. This just provides flexibility in how this method can be called. The computation starts at the exact millisecond this method is called
        Parameters:
        adjustmentsArray - a String object.
        Returns:
        a Calendar object.
        Throws:
        ParseException

      • today

        public static LocalDateTime today(String... adjustmentsArray)
        The adjustments are separated by a space. Multiple elements are acceptable and are assumed to be more adjusts. This just provides flexibility in how this method can be called. The computation starts at the beginning of the current date.
        Parameters:
        adjustmentsArray - a String object.
        Returns:
        a Calendar object.
